items.title: This Saturday support Gaby Miranda
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

This Saturday support Gaby Miranda

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby is selling pollo en mole & tofu con sabor mexicano on December 19. Her husband was deported earlier this year, and Gaby’s been working to support their fam...ily on her own ever since. This weekend she’s raising money to help pay for legal fees associated with her husband’s appeal. You can help support her by purchasing food at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

See More

items.title: Today is last day
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Today is last day

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Jeanette is selling tamales for pickup in Denver & Boulder this weekend. This is one way she’s working to support her family from the safety of the church in which she’s been in sanctuary for over two years. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co 📸: @time

items.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoHappy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds.... Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses. You can support our mission at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. 💕✨

See More
